alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL BAY COUNTY THROUGH 245 AM EDT... At 214 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Panama City Beach, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, West Bay, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Gulf Lagoon Beach, Magnolia Beach, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, Recota Beach, Gulf Resort Beach, West Panama City, Bahama Beach, Biltmore Beach, and Edgewater Gulf Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
